Handcrafted, Homemade Tuba's

The custom Tuba’s highlights are its great resonance, huge power and full tone projection. The Tuba has a warm timbre in all registers.

For information about the structure of a tuba.

Features

Premium Material

Our tuba's use the shiniest brass which is sourced locally. This will increase the longevity of your purchase.

Fast Shipping

We make sure you recieve your Tuba as soon as we have finished making it. We also provide free returns if you are not satisfied.

Quality

For every purchase you make, we will ensure there are no damages or faults and we will check and test the pitch of your instrument.
